summary: Verified all 4 user-requested changes: 1) IMEI column removed from PO page table and view dialog, 2) Pickup Location and To Location are now text inputs in Logistics page, 3) Notification system implemented in Logistics page for new procurements, 4) IMEI search filter working in Procurement page
context_for_next_testing_agent: All 4 requested changes verified working. PO page has no IMEI column, Logistics has text inputs for locations, Procurement has IMEI search filter, and notification system is implemented in code.

po_table_imei_removed.details: PO table headers: SL No, PO_ID, P.O Date, Purchase Office, Vendor, Location, Brand, Model, Storage, Colour, Qty, Rate, PO Value, Status, Actions - NO IMEI column

po_view_dialog_imei_removed.details: PO View dialog headers: SL, Vendor, Location, Brand, Model, Storage, Colour, Qty, Rate, Value - NO IMEI column

logistics_pickup_location_text_input.details: Pickup Location is INPUT element with data-testid='pickup-location-input' and placeholder 'Enter pickup location'

logistics_to_location_text_input.details: To Location is INPUT element with data-testid='to-location-input' and placeholder 'Enter destination'

procurement_imei_search_filter.details: IMEI search input found with data-testid='imei-search-input'. Filter correctly shows 'Showing 1 of 3 records' when filtering. Clear button restores all records. Non-matching search shows 'No records found for IMEI'

logistics_procurement_notification.details: Notification banner implemented with data-testid='procurement-notifications'. Shows when pendingProcurements.length > 0. Each notification has 'Create Shipment' button that pre-fills shipment form.

verified_changes: IMEI column removed from Purchase Orders table (15 columns now)
IMEI column removed from PO View dialog (10 columns now)
Pickup Location changed from Select dropdown to Input text field
To Location changed from Select dropdown to Input text field
IMEI search filter added to Procurement page with real-time filtering
Procurement notification system added to Logistics page with Create Shipment action
